noble.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: morally good or generous in a way that is admired
noble.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: It’s very noble of you to spend all your weekends helping the old folk.
noble.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: a member of an ancient noble family
The Marquis would have to marry a woman of noble blood.
noble.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: something that is noble is very impressive and beautiful
noble.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: the old church with its noble tower
noble.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a member of the highest social class with a title such as ‘Duke’ or ‘Countess’
